articles.title: Israel Launches Attack on Syrian Defence Ministry, Near Presidential Palace
articles.description: Israel has launched an attack on the Syrian Defence Ministry, near the Presidential Palace in Damascus, as fighting intensifies in Suwayda [1].

articles.title: Top news of the day: Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla returns to Earth after spending 18 days in ISS; Yemen postpones Nimisha Priya's execution, and more
articles.description: Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla returns to Earth after spending 18 days in the ISS. Yemen postpones Nimisha Priya's execution [2].

articles.title: With Epstein conspiracy theories, Trump faces a crisis of his own making
articles.description: Trump is facing a crisis due to Epstein conspiracy theories [3, 5].
